jobs.title: Openhouse
jobs.text:
• Full Stack Engineer for an incubator-backed start-up called OpenHouse.
• Developed website in a TDD – Agile approach as part of a 5-person engineering team.
• Technology: Ruby on Rails ⋅ HTML ⋅ CSS ⋅ mySQL ⋅ Cucumber ⋅ Capybara ⋅ CodeClimate ⋅ TravisCI ⋅ PivotalTracker ⋅ Git

jobs.title: Tienda TV
jobs.text:
• Coded the front and backend of the ad-exchange company’s website.
• Redesigned the company’s existing logo using Adobe Illustrator.
• Technology: Laravel ⋅ HTML ⋅ CSS ⋅ Javascript ⋅ Bootstrap ⋅ PHP

jobs.title: Personal Website
jobs.text:
• Designed and programmed my own personal website from scratch.
• Technology: HTML ⋅ CSS ⋅ JQuery ⋅ Bootstrap ⋅ Git

jobs.title: Latin American Leadership Society
jobs.text:
• Designed the logo and wrote the brand guidelines for UC Berkeley’s Latin American Leadership Society student group.
• Technology: Adobe Illustrator ⋅ Adobe Photoshop

jobs.title: Qinaya S.A.S
jobs.text:
• Individually designed and developed – from mockups to front-end – the website of a software consulting company.
• Redesigned the company’s logo and wrote the brand guidelines.
• Technology: ZK ⋅ Java ⋅ HTML ⋅ CSS ⋅ Javascript ⋅ Bootstrap
